data.title: How long does winter last in Siberia?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 7): In my region, permanent snow cover lasts from October to April, the average daily temperature is below zero from September to May. The heating season here is from September 10-15 to May 20-25, central heating works around the clock. Snow can fall in June and August. Nighttime tem...
